title: Semisi Tora
text:
Semisi Tora (born 28 January 1979) is a Fijian <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented his country at the <a href="2008%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2008 Rugby League World Cup</a>. He plays as a or forward. He is the son of dual-code rugby international <a href="Kaiava%20Salusalu">Kaiava Salusalu</a>.
As of 2012, he was playing for the <a href="Nyngan%20Tigers">Nyngan Tigers</a>. Tora also competed for Fiji at the <a href="2006%20Pacific%20Cup">2006 Pacific Cup</a>.
